outputs.output_descr: Support to Elections during the Transitional Period (SETP) Project Phase II focuses on voter registration, the expected referendum on a new Constitution, post-referendum elections, electoral reform, as well as public participation and information initiatives. Thus, the aim of this project is to align technical and financial support with the electoral cycle following the electoral milestones of the GCC Transitional Timeline in Yemen

Increasing the capacity of the Government of Yemen (GoY), and the Supreme Commission on Elections and Referendum (SCER), to reinforce the electoral cycle by conducting fair, open and inclusive elections within the terms of the agreed Transition Initiative (signed in Riyadh on 23 November, 2011)
